content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel myself a bad communicator. No one wants to talk with me.
That can be hard to hear, I' ve been there myself. It' s so refreshing to hear that other people are interested in listening and asking how to do something.
Yes I hope I can be the refreshing guy.
It sounds like you have a lot of things going on with life and you don' t want to let them consume you.
